events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to return the product because it doesn't match the description. How can I get a refund?
The request involves a refund or return for the product recently delivered to the customer.
Assigning the case to a refund specialist to handle the return and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can process your refund promptly?
My order number is 56789, and the product was faulty when it arrived. I want to return it and get my money back as soon as possible.
We have initiated your return request for order 56789. You will receive a prepaid shipping label by email shortly, and your refund will be processed within 5 business days after we receive the item.
Thank you for your help! I appreciate the quick response and the clear instructions for returning the product.
Your refund case is now resolved. Please use the label sent to you to return the product, and we will update you once the refund is complete.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
